name: I'm no shut-in
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 37 Theme: One Room

You control a young man who isolates himself in his home.
He believes in the existence of a secret organization that stalks him and prevents him from leaving his room.
Over time he starts to lose his sanity.

Comments:

  • "Absolutely atmospheric. Great work with the sounds." -BoltKey
  • "Very well done story & writing" -radmars
  • "Absolutely loved it. Reminded me of [...] my own patterns of anti-social behaviour (not that it had ever reached that extent). A/V was top notch as well." -afinkyu_Pheaky


Controls:

W, A, S, D Movement E Select (only in menus) or to interact Esc Cancel (only in the option menu) or to close the game
